TopicTitle: [WIP] KMS Leviathan (re: The Colony Ship Challenge)

Articles.Content:
Decided to take on The Colony Ship Challenge... this Thread will chronicle development as it takes place.

The KMS Leviathan

Current Status:

  • Command Module: Complete
  • Command Module Launch: Success - In LKO
  • Orbital Construction Station: Functional in LKO

Next Step: Build and test Satellites (ISA Map, Kethane and Communications) and the Orbital Stations.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Command Module

Designed as a multi-purpose core module for numerous extra-Kerbal missions, the Command Module is designed with extensibility in mind. Four main modules can be docked using a total of 11 Docking Port Sr. connectors, depending on the ship's needs; 14 additional Docking Ports allow for attachment of Satellites / Probes / etc. As befits a ship of this scale, the Command Module provides Viewports covering many angles of the ship. To provide long-term viability, power is provided by 12 Thermoelectric Generators.

Module Stats:

  • Crew: 40
  • Parts: 651
  • Weight: 293.13t

The KOS BifrÃƒÂ¶st

The bridge between planet Kerbal and the realm of the gods (or at least LKO). This project will require numerous large, awkward objects - rather than launching them all from Kerbal, this station allows launches of parts & final assembly in orbit. Though our Kerbin scientists tell us this comes at a cost of lifting more mass into orbit, the time savings was a requirement to keep this build on track.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Planetary Operations

Numerous structures and mobile craft will be required to meet the mission objectives.

Current Vehicles and Facilities:

  • Large Crew Transfer Rover: Complete
  • Kethane Mining Rig: Pending Final Details (Lights, etc.)
  • Floating Colony: Development version in testing with 50+ Kerbal capacity
